description: Variation of details of condition 2 (Approved plans) pursuant to planning permission 20/5437/FUL dated 12/02/2021 for `Demolition of the existing dwelling and erection of a new two storey dwelling with basement level and rooms in the roof space. Associated terrace areas and steps. Alterations to hard and soft landscaping. Retention and reduction of pond. Tree works. ` Amendments include Variations to include: Enlargement and alterations to basement footprint and lower ground floor terrace area including introduction of stairs from basement to garden terrace. Reduction in retained wall at basement level. Front lightwell. Relocation of staircase at basement level. Extension of ground floor terrace. Addition of staircase adjacent to garage. Increase in depth and width of rear projections at ground, first and second floor level. Chimneys added to north and south flank elevations.  Alterations to flat roof of dwelling including alterations to rooflights. Changes to detailing on building and alterations to fenestration. Resiting of garage to main house and addition of solar panels to roof
